If you need a little more manual control, you can of course use HTML anywhere in the app - and all the themes in RapidWeaver are CSS-based, so if youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re comfortable with HTML & CSS itÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s incredibly easy to further customize your design. You can even create and sell your own themes and plugins - and list them for free on our new Realmac Community site!

Stunning Designs
